recipes.title: Kairoseki Ore / Gem / Block / Bars
lines: §lKairoseki§r (translated "Seastone") is a rare stone that drains the power of Devil Fruit Users. Because Kairoseki gives off a wavelength that is the same as the sea itself it can only be found below §bOceans/Rivers§r and so on.
Blocks made of this stone can be used to disable Devil Fruit Users powers as well as weaken them.
Breaking a Kairoseki ore drops 1 §8Kairoseki Gem§r, while putting it in a furnace gives 2.

recipes.title: Steel / Dark Steel Ore / Ingot
lines: §lSteel ore§r can be found deep in every biome. Ingots obtained by melting it in a furnace are used to craft weapons and ammo.
